name: Send Real-Time Market Alerts to Telegram
description:
This scenario allows you to receive real-time news alerts from finlight directly in a Telegram chat.
When finlight pushes a new article via webhook (based on your custom filters), this automation formats the headline, timestamp, and summary, and sends it as a Telegram message.
Use this to track breaking financial news, central bank moves, geopolitical alerts, or company-specific headlinesâ€”without refreshing news sites.
